abstract.p: The N Grams component helps compute the frequency of contiguous sequence of n items from a text file or a column of a tab-delimited file.

info.description: This component computes the frequency of contiguous sequence of n items from a text file or a column of a tab-delimited file.

inputs.p: For Column in a file: a tab-delimited file is required.
For File: a PDF or a text file is required.

ol.li: PDF file: contains plot that depicts the n-grams result

options.p:
For Column in a file:
Text Column: select a column to get n-grams result.
N Grams: select from 1, 2, 3 or 4.
Exclude Stop Words: select yes to no for excluding stop words from the n-grams result.
Plot type: select plot type from Bar chart, Donut chart, Treemap or Circle packing
Plot Top Term: only plot the terms that have frequency higher than or equal to the threshold. Must be integer between 0 and 200.

For File: (only accept PDF or plain text)
N Grams: select from 1, 2, 3 or 4.
Exclude Stop Words: select yes to no for excluding stop words from the n-grams result.
Plot type: select plot type from Bar chart, Donut chart, Treemap or Circle packing
Plot Top Term: only plot the terms that have frequency higher than or equal to the threshold. Must be integer between 0 and 200.
